description: Round N+30: Expand procedural generation by adding a new multi-chamber "vault suite" prefab with interior walls + doors, plus regression tests.
notes: This file exists to make cumulative patch zips deterministic: include every file listed here (latest version) plus any newly changed/added files each round.
If you do not need cumulative patches, you can ignore this file.

patch_info.description: Round N+30: Expand procedural generation by adding a new multi-chamber "vault suite" prefab with interior walls + doors, plus regression tests.

summary: Added a new advanced vault prefab: "vault suites" partition some vault rooms into multiple chambers with interior walls and internal doors (LOS breaks + staged fights).
Vault suites still place at least one obstacle tile (pillars/chasm/boulders) and request a guaranteed bonus loot cache deep in the final chamber; deeper floors may request a second cache.
Added a unit test that scans seeds and asserts at least one vault suite appears (interior wall tiles + interior closed doors).
